Philosophy

Philosophy is about exploration. It explores new territory and offers the first map.

Science

Science takes that map and isolates variables. It offers empirical rigor.

Engineering

Engineering applies the science. It renders the science and philosophy actionable, making it a lived reality.

THE BLOG: THE PEAK PERFORMANCE FULL STACK

Towards a Gay Science

Not only am I programmable, but it is I who can do the programming. This is the heart of a gay science. It's a unification of theory and practice all for this larger goal...the will to power.
